name: Financial Mastery - Notion Template
description: Tracking finances shouldn't be a pain to do.As a firm believer that less is always more, I have created this simple yet effective Notion template that will help you:路 Have a unified way to track your income路 Separate your business from your personal expenses路 Create categories so you can group路 Get automatic monthly and yearly reports to have the bird's eye view necessary to understand your financesHere's a full walkthrough of the template
